name: The one thing you should know about the slaying of Rabbit O'Jack
name_original: The one thing you should know about the slaying of Rabbit O'Jack
description:
Overview:

Rabbit O’Jack is a TV show, adored by a Hedgehog named Hazel- a fifteen year old outcast with social anxiety.

2D Side Scroller in which narrative is shown through dialogue and metaphors within mini games.

A ‘whodunit’ mystery, taking place in the city of Woodney, solving the slaying of Rabbit O’Jack and finding the missing golden carrot.

Please note this game has not been thoroughly tested and contains bugs.

Developed by

Team Members:

Brayden Lee Beavis - Game Designer

Sarah Bohm - Systems Design

Jessica Bush - Art Design

Follow us on Twitter @ScratchnStudios
